overview:
Arsen Pereymer is the founder of appsbar a unique tool that empowers anyone to make complex mobile apps easily. Appsbar Inc. is located in Deerfield Beach, Florida. Pereymer got his start in programming at a very young age of 9. By 12, Arsen was already programming in C++.

Mr. Pereymer is a successful technology executive with more than 15 years of hands-on experience in designing software and leading web 2.0 companies. His niche focus and talents revolve around building re-usable frameworks and platforms that enable the non-technical user to build robust software which would normally require a developer. Prior to starting several of his own web companies, Mr. Pereymer held several management and executive roles at top financial services firms, in which he was responsible for leading successful implementations of re-usable platforms.
